trans-unit.source: Provides static methods and properties for <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.ArrayObject"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于静态方法和属性<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.ArrayObject"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: All methods of this class are called by passing in a reference to the object that is requesting access to the method.
trans-unit.target: 此类的所有方法所都调用的传入到正在请求对方法的访问的对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: This class belongs to the built-in object model category.
trans-unit.target: 此类所属的内置对象模型类别。

trans-unit.source: Concatenates objects or arrays to the end of the specified object or array.
trans-unit.target: 连接对象或数组的指定的对象或数组的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The object that this method is acting upon.
trans-unit.target: 此方法作用于的对象。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the scripting engine.
trans-unit.target: 对脚本引擎的引用。

trans-unit.source: The objects or arrays to append to `thisob`.
trans-unit.target: 对象或数组要追加到`thisob`。

trans-unit.source: thisob and args concatenated.
trans-unit.target: thisob和args串联在一起。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a prototype-based object that is using this prototype.
trans-unit.target: 获取基于原型的对象，该对象正在使用此原型的引用。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a prototype-based object.
trans-unit.target: 对基于原型的对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: Concatenates the elements of the specified array into a string.
trans-unit.target: 将指定数组的元素串联成一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: The elements are separated by the specified separator.
trans-unit.target: 指定的分隔符分隔的元素。

trans-unit.source: The object that this method is acting upon.
trans-unit.target: 此方法作用于的对象。

trans-unit.source: The string to use to separate the elements.
trans-unit.target: 要用于分隔元素的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default is a comma.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为逗号。

trans-unit.source: A string that concatenates the elements of thisob.
trans-unit.target: 连接的元素的字符串 thisob 。

trans-unit.source: Removes the last element from the specified array and returns it.
trans-unit.target: 从指定数组中移除的最后一个元素，并将其返回。

trans-unit.source: The object that this method is acting upon.
trans-unit.target: 此方法作用于的对象。

trans-unit.source: The last element of thisob.
trans-unit.target: 最后一个元素 thisob 。

trans-unit.source: Adds new elements to the end of the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 将新元素添加到指定数组的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The object that this method is acting upon.
trans-unit.target: 此方法作用于的对象。

trans-unit.source: The elements to add to `thisob`.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到元素`thisob`。

trans-unit.source: The new length of thisob.
trans-unit.target: 新长度 thisob 。

trans-unit.source: Reverses the elements of the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 反转指定数组的元素。

trans-unit.source: The object that this method is acting upon.
trans-unit.target: 此方法作用于的对象。

trans-unit.source: thisob.
trans-unit.target: thisob。

trans-unit.source: Removes the first element from the specified array and returns it.
trans-unit.target: 从指定数组中移除的第一个元素，并将其返回。

trans-unit.source: Shifts the remaining elements to the previous positions.
trans-unit.target: 将剩余元素位移到前面的位置。

trans-unit.source: The object that this method is acting upon.
trans-unit.target: 此方法作用于的对象。

trans-unit.source: The first element of thisob.
trans-unit.target: 第一个元素 thisob 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new array that contains the specified consecutive elements from the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新数组包含从指定数组的指定连续元素。

trans-unit.source: The object that this method is acting upon.
trans-unit.target: 此方法作用于的对象。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the scripting engine.
trans-unit.target: 对脚本引擎的引用。

trans-unit.source: The first consecutive element to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的第一个连续元素。

trans-unit.source: The last consecutive element to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的最后一个连续元素。

trans-unit.source: A new array that contains the consecutive elements between thisob[start] and thisob[end].
trans-unit.target: 包含之间的连续元素的新数组 thisob [start] 和 thisob [end]。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements of the specified array by using the specified function to compare the elements.
trans-unit.target: 指定数组的元素进行排序通过使用指定的函数进行比较的元素。

trans-unit.source: The object that this method is acting upon.
trans-unit.target: 此方法作用于的对象。

trans-unit.source: The function to use to compare elements.
trans-unit.target: 要用于比较元素的函数。

trans-unit.source: thisob.
trans-unit.target: thisob。

trans-unit.source: Adds and removes elements from an array at the specified position in the array.
trans-unit.target: 添加和移除数组中的指定位置处的数组中的元素。

trans-unit.source: You can add elements, remove elements, or both.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加元素和 / 或删除元素。

trans-unit.source: The object that this method is acting upon.
trans-unit.target: 此方法作用于的对象。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the scripting engine.
trans-unit.target: 对脚本引擎的引用。

trans-unit.source: The position in the array to add and remove elements.
trans-unit.target: 要添加和移除元素的数组中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements to remove, if any.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除，如果有的元素数目。

trans-unit.source: The elements to add, if any.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加，如果任何元素。

trans-unit.source: A new array that contains the elements removed from thisob, if any have been removed.
trans-unit.target: 包含从已移除元素的新数组 thisob ，如果任何已删除。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of the specified object that concatenates the elements and separates them with a <xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo.ListSeparator*> and a space.
trans-unit.target: 创建的字符串表示形式的指定对象，串联元素并将它们与分开<xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo.ListSeparator*>和空格。</xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo.ListSeparator*>

trans-unit.source: The object that this method is acting upon.
trans-unit.target: 此方法作用于的对象。

trans-unit.source: A string that concatenates the elements of thisob and separates them with a and a space.
trans-unit.target: 连接的元素的字符串 thisob 并分隔它们与和空格。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of the specified object that concatenates the elements and separates them with a comma.
trans-unit.target: 创建的字符串表示形式的指定对象，将元素连接在一起并并用逗号分隔它们。

trans-unit.source: The object that this method is acting upon.
trans-unit.target: 此方法作用于的对象。

trans-unit.source: A string that concatenates the elements of thisob and separates them with a comma.
trans-unit.target: 连接的元素的字符串 thisob 并用逗号分隔这些。

trans-unit.source: Adds new elements to the start of the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 将新元素添加到指定数组的开头。

trans-unit.source: Shifts the existing elements to the next positions.
trans-unit.target: 将现有元素移动到下一步的位置。

trans-unit.source: The object that this method is acting upon.
trans-unit.target: 此方法作用于的对象。

trans-unit.source: The elements to add to `thisob`.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到元素`thisob`。

trans-unit.source: The new length of thisob.
trans-unit.target: 新长度 thisob 。
